title: Ghislaine Maxwell’s Guilty Verdict Brings ‘Wave of Relief’ to Epstein Accusers
sub_head: Women who alleged Jeffrey Epstein sexually abused them report feeling vindicated by Wednesday’s verdict
body:
The sex-trafficking conviction of British socialite Ghislaine Maxwell brings a measure of justice to the scores of women who accused disgraced financier Jeffrey Epstein of sexual abuse, the accusers and their lawyers said.
“My soul yearned for justice for years and today the jury gave me just that,” Virginia Giuffre, one of Epstein’s accusers, wrote on Twitter after the verdict. “I will remember this day always.”
